SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated product finds
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what our satisfied users are saying about their product discovery journey
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my shopping experience! I've found so many unique products I never knew existed.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a small business owner, this app has helped me stay ahead of the curve by discovering innovative products for my store.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app constantly surprises me with cool new gadgets and accessories. It's like having a personal product curator!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore a world of innovative products before they hit the mainstream. Be the first to know, try, and own the latest trends.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us know what you're looking for, and we'll help you find it!
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: AI-powered device to control your home
CTA_BODY: Explore a world of innovative and exciting new products tailored to your interests and needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to recommend new and exciting products tailored to your interests. Simply input your likes and dislikes, and we'll curate a personalized selection of items for you to explore.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are the products on the app available for purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes! All products featured on our app are available for purchase. We partner with various retailers and brands to ensure you can easily buy any item that catches your eye, directly through our platform.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most innovative items. Our team constantly scours the market for unique and trending products to keep your discovery experience fresh and exciting.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I save or share products I like?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! You can save your favorite products to your personal wishlist for future reference. Additionally, you can easily share any product you find interesting with friends and family via social media or email, right from within the app.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products
HERO_SUBTITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find the Next Must-Have Item
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about discovering exciting new products
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the app help me find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized selection of innovative and trending products tailored just for you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Are the products on the app available for purchase?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, most products featured on our app are available for purchase. We provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can buy the items that catch your eye.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How often are new products added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most exciting items across various categories.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I save or bookmark products for later?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! You can easily save products to your favorites list or create custom collections for future reference and easy access.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our app is free to download and use. We may offer premium features in the future, but our core product discovery functionality will always remain free.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get tailored product suggestions based on your browsing history, preferences, and interests for a truly customized shopping experience.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with honest feedback from real users, helping you find products that truly meet your needs.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Easily compare prices across multiple retailers to ensure you're getting the best deal on your desired products.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Set up notifications for price drops, restocks, or new releases of products you're interested in, so you never miss out.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Explore a carefully curated selection of unique and innovative products from up-and-coming brands and inventors.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products Today!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Explore a world of cutting-edge products, curated just for you. Stay ahead of the curve and find your next must-have item with our intuitive discovery platform.
